statements: SELECT * FROM boxing_champions LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, nationality, weight_class FROM boxing_champions WHERE wins > 20;
SELECT id, name, wins, losses FROM boxing_champions WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM boxing_champions ORDER BY wins DESC;
SELECT name, weight_class, championships_won FROM boxing_champions WHERE draws = 0 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM boxing_champions WHERE nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY wins DESC, losses ASC
SELECT name, weight_class, wins, draws FROM boxing_champions WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight' AND wins >= 30 ORDER BY name
SELECT name, championships_won FROM boxing_champions WHERE wins > 50 AND (weight_class = 'Middleweight' OR weight_class = 'Welterweight')
SELECT nationality, COUNT(*) as total_champions FROM boxing_champions GROUP BY nationality HAVING total_champions > 2 ORDER BY total_champions DESC
SELECT * FROM boxing_champions WHERE draws > 0 ORDER BY draws DESC, wins DESC
SELECT * FROM boxing_champions;
SELECT name, nationality FROM boxing_champions WHERE weight_class='Welterweight';
SELECT id, name, title_won_date FROM boxing_champions ORDER BY title_won_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM boxing_records WHERE result='Win' AND knockout=true;
SELECT name, result, date FROM boxing_champions JOIN boxing_records ON boxing_champions.id = boxing_records.champion_id;
SELECT * FROM boxing_champions WHERE nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, weight_class FROM boxing_champions WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, title_won_date FROM boxing_champions WHERE title_won_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY title_won_date DESC;
SELECT name, nationality, opponent_name FROM boxing_champions AS bc INNER JOIN boxing_records AS br ON bc.id = br.champion_id WHERE br.result = 'WIN' AND br.round <= 5 ORDER BY bc.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM boxing_champions WHERE weight_class = 'Middleweight' AND id IN (SELECT champion_id FROM boxing_records WHERE result = 'LOSS' AND knockout = TRUE);
SELECT * FROM boxing_champions;
SELECT name, weight_class FROM boxing_champions WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM titles ORDER BY date_awarded DESC;
SELECT champion_id, opponent, result FROM matches WHERE result = 'Win' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT nationality, COUNT(*) AS total_champions FROM boxing_champions GROUP BY nationality;
SELECT * FROM boxing_champions;
SELECT name, weight_class FROM boxing_champions WHERE nationality='USA';
SELECT champion_id, title_name, date_awarded FROM titles ORDER BY date_awarded DESC;
SELECT opponent, result FROM matches WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT name AS Champion_Name, record AS Champion_Record FROM boxing_champions WHERE weight_class='Heavyweight';
SELECT * FROM boxing_champions;
SELECT name, weight_class FROM boxing_champions WHERE nationality='USA';
SELECT date_of_birth, name, nationality FROM boxing_champions ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM boxing_records WHERE result='Win' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT champion_id, wins, losses, draws, KO FROM boxing_stats WHERE wins > 20 AND losses < 5;
SELECT * FROM boxing_champions WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight';
SELECT name, nationality FROM boxing_champions ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT title_name, date_won FROM boxing_titles WHERE date_won BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT opponent_name, result FROM boxing_records WHERE result = 'Win' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT champion_id, wins, losses, draws, KO FROM boxing_stats WHERE wins > 20 AND losses < 5 ORDER BY KO DESC;
SELECT * FROM past_boxing_champions;
SELECT champion_name, country FROM past_boxing_champions WHERE weight_class = 'Heavyweight';
SELECT champion_name, date_of_birth FROM past_boxing_champions ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM boxing_titles WHERE date_received >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT champion_name, opponent_name, result FROM boxing_records WHERE fight_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2019-12-31';
SELECT champion_name, weight_class, country FROM past_boxing_champions ORDER BY champion_name DESC, weight_class ASC
SELECT title_name, date_received FROM boxing_titles WHERE weight_class='Heavyweight' AND date_received > '2021-01-01'
SELECT champion_name, opponent_name, result FROM boxing_records WHERE result='Win' OR result='Draw' LIMIT 10

SELECT champion_name, induction_category FROM past_boxing_champions JOIN hall_of_fame ON past_boxing_champions.champion_id = hall_of_fame.champion_id WHERE year_inducted >= 2000 ORDER BY year_inducted DESC
SELECT champion1_id, champion2_id, belt_title FROM bouts WHERE weight_class='Welterweight' ORDER BY date_held ASC
